arts.ttl: Pantaloni praises Dembélé and the contribution of Luis Enrique
arts.sum: On the eve of Paris Saint-Germain’s trip to Lorient, Lorient head coach Olivier Pantaloni spoke at a press conference about the form of Ousmane Dembélé (28), the 2025 Ballon d’Or winner.
